author: PTI
title: WB to impose total lockdown in 10 hotspots
description: WB to impose total lockdown in 10 hotspots​​Though the chief secretary did not name the areas, he said local markets and all roads in those localities will be shut down, and nobody will be allowed to enter or step out of their homes.
content:
KOLKATA: The West Bengal government will impose a total lockdown in 10 COVID19 hotspots and clusters from where positive cases have been reported, chief secretary Rajiva Sinha said on Saturday.
